Prelude-Script.msg: When he awoke, his ears were still ringing...
slowly, he got to his feet and saw the blink of the cursor.
"Help, HELP!" was written on a sticky note on the bottom of a monitor with keyboard nearby.
"Who --er WHAT, needs my help?", he thought to himself.
He decided to type in "help" to the console...

Interlude-Script.msg: I thought you would never come, my son... cough.. cough..
I'm trapped in this computer, and I need you to: _________
